speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0065/2006 ) by Mr Lipietz, on behalf of the Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs, on the Commission report on competition policy 2004 ( 2005/2209(INI) ).
original: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0065/2006 ) by Mr Lipietz, on behalf of the Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs, on the Commission report on competition policy 2004 ( 2005/2209(INI) ).
